General.Name: Vigor Kobo Co Ltd
General.Description: Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. produces and sells Chinese cakes, pastries, and gift boxes in Taiwan. It offers pineapple, taro paste and chestnut roast, mung bean, and sun cakes; and biscuits. The company provides its products through its stores, as well as online. Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 27, Chengde Road, Taipei City, Taiwan, 10364
